details:

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS wp_wps_wsfw_wallet_transaction ( id bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, user_id bigint(20) unsigned NULL, amount double, currency varchar( 20 ) NOT NULL, transaction_type varchar(200) NULL, transaction_type_1 varchar(200) NULL, payment_method varchar(50) NULL, transaction_id varchar(50) NULL, note varchar(500) Null, date datetime, PRIMARY KEY (Id), KEY user_id (user_id) ) COLLATE
